channel.title: CVE Feed for heroiclabs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for heroiclabs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2321|2024-08-03T00:32:09.662Z -- heroiclabs -- heroiclabs%2Fnakama
item.description: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts in GitHub repository heroiclabs/nakama prior to 3.13.0. This results in login brute-force attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-2306|2024-08-03T00:32:09.620Z -- heroiclabs -- heroiclabs%2Fnakama
item.description: Old session tokens can be used to authenticate to the application and send authenticated requests.
